channel.title: Can someone do me a favour?
channel.description:
Hey,
Can someone buy me a domain from 1and1?
I'll pay you back immediatly through a bank transfer(can take up to 8 days however), it's just that every domain registrant I can find requires you to have a Credit card or a verified paypal. I have my account all set up on 1and1 which I can give you a password for and all you need to do is enter your credit card to buy the domain, and I will send you 10 dollars(even though the domain is only like 6 dollars).
PM me if your willing to help, thanks.

item.title: Can someone do me a favour?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
